post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
I am not doing anything this coming long weekend. I like to go back to last picnic location, Valens in Hamilton.
Program will be the same as last time. Saturday Aug 3rd 1:00 pm.
Please add your name to list if you are coming password is still "1"
List of participants ----------------------- Thomas Lee Jay lee Jeffrey Lee Yun Jung Kang ??? Spencer Hwang Steve Kang 홍영기
post.title: Picnic over the long weekend
